hero.title: Welcome to Our Quantum Community
hero.description: We are a colombian student group that carries out educational open source projects in quantum computing.

main.title: Learn Quantum Computing Fundamentals with Qiskit
main.description: It is expected to elaborate on important advanced topics of high interest for physics, computer science and engineering students, at an undergraduate level.

blog.title: Latest Blog Posts
blog.subtitle: Check out all our posts here

github.title: Join our GitHub Organization
github.description: We are a very open community, eager to see your contributions to quantum computing education. You can be a part of the second quantum revolution in Latam with our group.

twitch.title: Follow our live sessions
twitch.description: Join our live in-depth sessions in twitch all sunday evenings. We discuss advanced topics in computer science, quantum mechanics, quantum computing and the intersection of these areas.

discord.title: Interact with us in Discord
discord.description: Meet students from Colombia, and share your knowledge in a very safe and open environment. By joining our discord, you will receive notifications about our latest events.
